channel.description:

just open it and click run.bat

item.title: First ever java program
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:362801”][quote author=_s link=topic=458545.msg3358848#msg3358848 date=1286150117]

So you judge people by posts made on mscp? That’s fucking hilarious.
[/quote]normally the intelligence shown in a post correlates with that of real life intelligence, please prove wrong the fact that you are stupid.

Seeing as John takes the time to use grammar conventions, and actually capitalize his sentences, I’d say you are the stupid one.[/quote]
Is Thomas Edison dumb? He was dyslexic.

Spelling is never a sign of low intelligence, some of history’s greatest minds were known to be eccentric and uneducated. Good grammar DOES tend to influence your opinion of a poster but it doesn’t mean they’re dumb.

Grammar != Intelligence.

Read full topic

item.title: First ever java program
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

[quote=“John459, post:15, topic:362259”][quote author=_s link=topic=458545.msg3358799#msg3358799 date=1286148678]

[quote author=John459 link=topic=458545.msg3358796#msg3358796 date=1286148597]

[quote author=_s link=topic=458545.msg3358789#msg3358789 date=1286148410]

Cleaned it up a little for you:

[code]import java.util.Scanner;

public class Calculator {

public static void main(String[] args) {
    double numberA, numberB;
    Scanner s = new Scanner(System.in);
    System.out.println("Enter your name");
    System.out.println("Hello " + s.next());
    System.out.println("Enter the first number");
    numberA = s.nextDouble();
    System.out.println("Enter the second number");
    numberB = s.nextDouble();
    System.out.println(numberA + " + " + numberB + " = " + (numberA+numberB));
    System.out.println(numberA+" - "+numberB+" = " + (numberA-numberB));
    System.out.println(numberA+" * "+numberB+" = " + (numberA*numberB));
    System.out.println(numberA+" / "+numberB + " = " + (numberA/numberB));
}

}[/code]
[/quote]were you born retarded?

No, but apparently you were. I made it do the exact same thing as the one he posted, but cleaned it up. Nothing else to it. If you think that is somehow worse than his then you better go see a doctor because something is obviously wrong with you.
[/quote]…it’s like cleaning up shit with a shitstained mop!

You get dumber by the second. Read what I posted:

I made it do the exact same thing as the one he posted

Although that way is a bad way to do it, it is the way he chose to do it.
[/quote]in which case you should be suggesting he does it the way you would, not encouraging him to use shit by making the shit a fraction more tolerable

That is for him to learn.[/quote]so you happily improve shit code and leave everyone to guess how you’d do it (which is probably just as gay judging from this thread alone)

Read full topic

item.title: First ever java program
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:

Cleaned it up a little for you:

[code]import java.util.Scanner;

public class Calculator {

public static void main(String[] args) {
    double numberA, numberB;
    Scanner s = new Scanner(System.in);
    System.out.println("Enter your name");
    System.out.println("Hello " + s.next());
    System.out.println("Enter the first number");
    numberA = s.nextDouble();
    System.out.println("Enter the second number");
    numberB = s.nextDouble();
    System.out.println(numberA + " + " + numberB + " = " + (numberA+numberB));
    System.out.println(numberA+" - "+numberB+" = " + (numberA-numberB));
    System.out.println(numberA+" * "+numberB+" = " + (numberA*numberB));
    System.out.println(numberA+" / "+numberB + " = " + (numberA/numberB));
}

}[/code]
[/quote]were you born retarded?

No, but apparently you were. I made it do the exact same thing as the one he posted, but cleaned it up. Nothing else to it. If you think that is somehow worse than his then you better go see a doctor because something is obviously wrong with you.
[/quote]…it’s like cleaning up shit with a shitstained mop!

You get dumber by the second. Read what I posted:

I made it do the exact same thing as the one he posted

Although that way is a bad way to do it, it is the way he chose to do it.
[/quote]in which case you should be suggesting he does it the way you would, not encouraging him to use shit by making the shit a fraction more tolerable[/quote]

That is for him to learn.
